#summary &boxdr; character entity

#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesB

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesB B] > &boxdr;

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&boxDR;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2554/index.htm U+02554].
  * `&boxDr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2553/index.htm U+02553].
  * `&boxdR;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2552/index.htm U+02552].
  * `&boxdr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/250c/index.htm U+0250C].
